panels.description: Right edge of the graph shows latest state of the backup-verify job and when it entered such state.
panels.title: Job State

targets.expr: sum(irate(velor_backup_service_sent_bytes{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", endpoint=~"$backup_service_api_name"}[1m])) by(kubernetes_pod_name, kubernetes_pod_name) > 0

panels.description: Right edge of the graph shows latest state of the restore job and when it entered such state.

targets.expr:
velor_db_restore_coordinator_start_timestamp_s{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"} * 1000
unless velor_db_restore_coordinator_succeed_timestamp_s > velor_db_restore_coordinator_start_timestamp_s
unless velor_db_restore_coordinator_fail_timestamp_s > velor_db_restore_coordinator_start_timestamp_s

# any restore activity:
and (rate(velor_db_restore_epoch_ending_epoch[1m]) > 0 or rate(velor_db_restore_state_snapshot_leaf_index[1m]) > 0 or rate(velor_db_restore_transaction_save_version[1m]) > 0 or rate(velor_db_restore_transaction_replay_version[1m]) > 0) == bool 1

panels.title: Job State

panels.description:
save: Version of txn being saved without replaying
replay: Version of txn being replayed
target: When "replay" hits this version, the restore is done.
panels.title: Transaction Restore Progress

panels.description: Right edge of the graph shows latest state of the restore job and when it entered such state.

targets.expr:
velor_db_restore_coordinator_start_timestamp_s{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"} * 1000
unless velor_db_restore_coordinator_succeed_timestamp_s > velor_db_restore_coordinator_start_timestamp_s
unless velor_db_restore_coordinator_fail_timestamp_s > velor_db_restore_coordinator_start_timestamp_s

# any restore activity:
and (rate(velor_db_restore_epoch_ending_epoch[1m]) > 0 or rate(velor_db_restore_state_snapshot_leaf_index[1m]) > 0 or rate(velor_db_restore_transaction_save_version[1m]) > 0 or rate(velor_db_restore_transaction_replay_version[1m]) > 0) == bool 1

panels.title: Job State

panels.description:
save: Version of txn being saved without replaying
replay: Version of txn being replayed
target: When "replay" hits this version, the restore is done.
panels.title: Transaction Restore Progress

panels.description:
save: Version of txn being saved without replaying
replay: Version of txn being replayed
target: When "replay" hits this version, the restore is done.
panels.title: State Snapshot Restore Progress

panels.description:
"Committed" version is the version on the latest ledger info saved.

"Synced" version is the version on the latest transaction saved, it's only different when state-sync is working to catch up with peers.
panels.title: Committed and Synced Versions
